caption.title: Quantitative real-time gene expression analysis of hub proteins encoding genes in PBMCs from control vs. PD.
caption.p: a B2M, b TARDBP, c EFEMP2, d MMP9, e MEAF2A relating copper, magnesium, aluminum, calcium, and iron, respectively. The gene expression of f SOD1, and g hsCRP are the markers for PD. Bars represent the Average, standard deviation (SD) with * P value < 0.05.
